subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bears’ Devin Hester blazes through defenses on punt and kickoff returns, and in the off-season he speeds around on an all-terrain vehicle and a Jet Ski.
snippet: The Chicago Bears’ Devin Hester blazes through defenses on punt and kickoff returns, and in the off-season he speeds around on an all-terrain vehicle and a Jet Ski.
